column1: The Purple Pig////As far as restaurant experiences go
column2: this one had to be the worst. No reservations
column3: so you have to stand and wait. We landed on a Saturday
column5: and was told it'll be a 2.5-3 hour wait. You only have 10 minutes to get back to the restaurant by the time they text you that the table is ready. If you have the yelp app
column6: you can keep tabs on your place on the waiting list so you don't miss your table. If you come in later in the evening
column7: you run the risk of dishes being sold out. They sat us on a 2 person table
column8: so the table was pretty tight. The restaurant is very loud and our server was hard to reach at times because of the number of tables she was serving. I personally don't think this place is worth the 3 hour wait on a Saturday night.
